CIPHER.0.cipherString: Enthusiasm is excitement with inspiration, motivation, and a pinch of creativity.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: I understand all the problems for the Ministry of Defence, of course I do; working within a budget and trying to do so many things is not easy.
CIPHER.1.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(19,9).

CIPHER.2.cipherString: My mother taught me to be honest, to be selfless, and to touch people in a positive way.
CIPHER.2.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,9).

CIPHER.3.cipherString: There is nothing so skillful in its own defense as imperious pride.
CIPHER.3.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(3,16).

CIPHER.4.cipherString: I'd say that animal rights and environmental issues have always been at the forefront of my mind.
CIPHER.4.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,21).

CIPHER.5.cipherString: Puberty for a girl is like floating down a broadening river into an open sea.
CIPHER.5.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,15).

CIPHER.6.cipherString: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.
CIPHER.6.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,22).

CIPHER.7.cipherString: Marketers are out there trying to figure out how to get your money out of your child.
CIPHER.7.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(15,10).

CIPHER.8.cipherString: An epic is not made by piecing together a set of heroic lays, adjusting their discrepancies and making them into a continuous narrative.
CIPHER.8.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,18).

CIPHER.9.cipherString: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,11).

CIPHER.10.cipherString: The buried talent is the sunken rock on which most lives strike and founder.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence which has been encoded with an Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,18).

CIPHER.11.cipherString: No, I'm not a lager lout either. I think you have to be a massive football fan to be a lager lout.
CIPHER.11.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,8).

CIPHER.12.cipherString: Groups are grammatical fictions; only individuals exist, and each individual is different.
CIPHER.12.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,15).

CIPHER.13.cipherString: You think dogs will not be in heaven? I tell you, they will be there long before any of us.
CIPHER.13.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(7,17).

CIPHER.14.cipherString: As a singer, I float around. I'm kind of scatty, bouncing around a lot. I try to adapt to what's going on around me in the song and the arrangement.
CIPHER.14.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,5).

CIPHER.15.cipherString: No amount of humanitarian assistance can protect people from being attacked.
CIPHER.15.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(9,16).

CIPHER.16.cipherString: I really did try to write it so that an educated public that cares about issues like this doesn't have to be a lawyer and can read it and understand it.
CIPHER.16.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(5,20).

CIPHER.17.cipherString: When men yield up the privilege of thinking, the last shadow of liberty quits the horizon.
CIPHER.17.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,19).

CIPHER.18.cipherString: I would rather excel in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and possessions.
CIPHER.18.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(11,21).

CIPHER.19.cipherString: I mostly drive around in a Fiat 500 TwinAir, and that's a pretty small car!
CIPHER.19.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(23,4).

CIPHER.20.cipherString: The Bermuda Triangle got tired of warm weather. It moved to Alaska. Now Santa Claus is missing.
CIPHER.20.question: Encode this sentence with the Affine cipher. (a,b)=(17,17).
